rows.label: qev030102_MSG0002
rows.name:
We will hone our fangs.
Have revenge on Cavern Clan.
They will pay in blood![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030102_MSG0005
rows.name: He is weak. He weeps tears of fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030102_MSG0006
rows.name:
I am also weak. I could not save him.
Please bring my brother home.[ST:wait ]
